data.description: Immersive yoga classes developed exclusively for Oculus. Classes are taught be professional instructors shot in unique, inspiring locations in nature.

changelog.change_log:
* Faster load times get you to your content faster.
* Video playback resolution can now be manually selected.
* Hand tracking for classes has been enabled giving you a better sense of your body in space.
* New high-resolution 3D 360° menu backgrounds share the beauty of our amazing shoot locations.
* Enhanced carousel ordering and horizontal scrolling.
* New featured video section allows you to see the latest content at a glance.
* Short class descriptions now appear on rollover while the detailed video cards are now available for all videos.
* Behind the scenes bug fixes and optimizations.
